p: The sample of M. officinalis leaves ( Figure 1) was collected in May 2018 at Algiers in north Algeria (36°46′ N, 3°03′ E). The species was identified at the Laboratory of Bioactive Products and Biomass Valorization Research, ENS Kouba, and was confirmed in the botanical department of National Institute Agronomic of Algiers (NIA), Algeria.
